extracted_playbook.condition: Does the organization have externally facing infrastructure devices with vulnerabilities?

extracted_playbook.title: Adopt 'Assume Breach' Mentality
extracted_playbook.description: Operate under the assumption that a breach has already occurred to enhance vigilance and response readiness.

extracted_playbook.title: Focus on Network Hygiene
extracted_playbook.description: Implement traditional network hygiene practices to mitigate potential exploitation activities.

extracted_playbook.title: Enhance User Management
extracted_playbook.description: Strengthen user management activities to prevent unauthorized access and escalation.
